articles.content: The Korean combination of Shin Yubin and Jeon Jihi also lost against the Indian team on Saturday, 3-2 (7-11, 11-9, 11-9, 7-11, 11-9), post which Sutirtha and Ayhika made it to the final. Both the men… [+198 chars]

articles.author: Dave Middleton
articles.title: Aussie quicks in thick of County Championship action - cricket.com.au
articles.description: Wes Agar's five-wicket haul headlined a day out for a trio of Aussie pacemen across the two country divisions, while leg-spinner Swepson also bowled on debut
articles.content:
Five wickets for Wes Agar has capped a good day for Australian bowlers in the county championship, with Sean Abbott and Nathan McAndrew claiming four-wicket hauls in their respective matches.
Agar's… [+3096 chars]

articles.author: Aditya Maheshwari
articles.title: 'India Haven't Got it Because When You Want to Win The Big One, You Need...': Shastri on ICC Title Drought - News18
articles.description: Ravi Shastri said that it's unfair to blame one individual for not winning the ICC trophy.
articles.content: Former head coach Ravi Shastri brushed off the chokers tag given to the Indian cricket team after their struggle to win the ICC trophies in recent times. India lost won an ICC trophy way back in 2013… [+2015 chars]
